name: topk_d201088_k50
description: Top-k selection over vocabulary (201088) with k=50. Used in gpt-oss-120b for sampling.

k.description: Number of top elements to select

reference:
import torch

@torch.no_grad()
def run(input, k):
    batch_size, vocab_size = input.shape
    
    # Check constants
    assert vocab_size == 201088
    assert k == 50
    
    values, indices = torch.topk(input, k, dim=-1)
    return values, indices
